name: Limsod
description:
Following a virus released from the laboratories, the population has been totally transformed into zombies determined to devour what remains of civilization. Accept your mission to wipe out all the zombies in these areas that have been left abandoned for years. Be careful, a small part of the zombies have been severely impacted, giving them special characteristics, which can turn your simple mission into a terrible hell. Quickly take your basic equipment and kill all the zombies to make the area peaceful again. Once you have achieved your goal, return to the base and upgrade your equipment for your next missions.

  • Fight with 8 different types of zombie, each with its own properties
  • Explore over 20 unique maps with 10 different game modes
  • Unlock a wide range of equipment modifications and upgrades that will influence gameplay
  • Progress through your adventure to complete 80 quests and objectives


Limsod is much more than just a zombie game. With its many game modes, multiple play styles are possible:
  • Survival mode: Survive 5 minutes in a zombie-infested map
  • Unlimited mode: Survive in a vast world with no time limit
  • Death Sleeves mode: Kill zombies, pass sleeves to unlock new map part and a new gameplay style
  • Defense mode: Defend an antenna against a horde of zombies that attract him
  • Training mode: Train in a shooting range on harmless zombies
  • Point Race mode: Every action you perform earns points, get the points you need before time runs out
  • Time Saving mode: Every zombie you kill saves you time, so survive as long as possible
  • Melee mode: Use your weapon in a different way to exterminate the entire zombie horde
  • Preview mode: Explore the maps peacefully
  • Custom mode: Customize absolutely every parameter to create your perfect game mode
